import React, { useState } from 'react' import './VideosStyle.css' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' import ModalVideo from 'react-modal-video' const Videos = () => { const [openModal, setOpenModal] = useState({}) const toggleModal = (modal) => { setOpenModal({ ...openModal, [modal]: !openModal[modal] }); } return (
setOpenModal(false)} />
setOpenModal(false)} />
setOpenModal(false)} />
) } export default Videos
